channel.title: how-to on Diwise for Developers
channel.description: Recent content in how-to on Diwise for Developers

item.title: Add a device
item.description: Heads up! The device/sensor that should be added need to be of a known type, that is, a decoder for the type of sensor must already exist and the device/sensor should be provisioned within the LoRa application server. How to add a new sensor Add device metadata Device metadata is stored in iot-device-mgmt. When iot-device-mgmt starts up it load data from csv-files and adds information to its database. The file 30.
